title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Calypso, North Carolina
content:
Photo submitted by Tyler Benedict, “Taken on the second day of a three-day ride to meet my family at the beach. I added road tires to the Fezzari gravel bike. More details on this bike coming soon.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Calypso, North Carolina appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
